text: @EricTrump @realDonaldTrump I vote you as the dumbest Trump, next to your father, Eric, because you don’t know what the hell you are saying. Let’s agree you have never actually worked a day in your life.  Now let’s think about how hard each Governor works now managing the Coronavirus in each of their states
